subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Woody Austin fell face first into the lake along the 14th fairway, but nonetheless helped the International team win four matches to cut the Americans’ lead to 7-5 after two days at Royal Montreal.
snippet: Woody Austin fell face first into the lake along the 14th fairway, but nonetheless helped the International team win four matches to cut the Americans’ lead to 7-5 after two days at Royal Montreal.
